AAW.caption: Text
AAW.doc: Message to be displayed in the toast
AAW.name: text

AAX.caption: Duration
AAX.doc: Duration for which the toast should be displayed. -1 for permanent toast
AAX.name: duration

AAY.caption: Gravity
AAY.doc: To show the toast from top or bottom
AAY.name: gravity

AAZ.caption: Position
AAZ.doc: To show the toast on left or right
AAZ.name: position

AAa.caption: Close
AAa.doc: To show the close icon or not
AAa.name: close

AAb.caption: Stop on Focus
AAb.doc: To stop timer when hovered over the toast (Only if duration is set)
AAb.name: stoponfocus

AAc.caption: Avatar
AAc.doc: Image/icon to be shown before text
AAc.name: avatar

AAd.caption: Background Color
AAd.doc: Sets the background color of the toast
AAd.name: backgroundcolor

AAf.caption: Destination
AAf.doc: URL to which the browser should be navigated on click of the toast
AAf.name: destination

AAg.caption: New Window
AAg.doc: Decides whether the destination should be opened in a new window or not
AAg.name: new_window
